00011 //---------- Begin of function Vga::disp_image_file --------//
00017 void Vga::disp_image_file(char* fileName, int x1, int y1) {
00018     //-------- backup and switch palette ----------//
00019 
00020     if( !back_up_pal )                              // only save the palette when there isn't one saved already
00021         back_up_pal = new VgaCustomPalette(NULL);
00022 
00023   //---- load the interface into the back buffer ----//
00024 
00025     File pictFile;
00026     String str;
00027 
00028     str  = DIR_IMAGE;
00029     str += fileName;
00030     str += ".ICN";
00031 
00032     if( pictFile.file_open(str,0) ) {
00033         vga_back.put_large_bitmap(x1, y1, &pictFile);
00034         pictFile.file_close();
00035     }
00036 
00037     //-------- hide and change mouse cursor --------//
00038 
00039     mouse.hide();
00040 
00041     //------ turn screen dark and blt the buffer ---------//
00042 
00043     vga_front.bar( 0, 0, VGA_WIDTH-1, VGA_HEIGHT-1, 0 );
00044     sys.blt_virtual_buf(); {
00045 
00046         //------- Set custom palette -------//
00047 
00048         str  = DIR_IMAGE;
00049         str += fileName;
00050         str += ".COL";
00051 
00052         err_when( !m.is_file_exist(str) );
00053 
00054         VgaFrontLock vgaLock;
00055         VgaCustomPalette::set_custom_palette(str);
00056     }
00057 
00058     //------- bilt the back buffer to the front ---------//
00059 
00060     vga.blt_buf( 0,0, vga_back.buf_width()-1, vga_back.buf_height()-1 );
00061 }
00062 
00063 //----------- End of function Vga::disp_image_file ---------//
00064 
00065 //---------- Begin of function Vga::finish_disp_image_file --------//
00067 void Vga::finish_disp_image_file() {
00068     //------- exiting: turn dark --------//
00069 
00070     vga_front.bar( 0, 0, VGA_WIDTH-1, VGA_HEIGHT-1, 0 );
00071     sys.blt_virtual_buf(); {
00072 
00073         //----- palette restore when back_up_pal destruct ----//
00074 
00075         VgaFrontLock vgaLock;
00076 
00077         err_when( !back_up_pal );
00078 
00079         delete back_up_pal;
00080         back_up_pal = NULL;
00081     }
00082 
00083     mouse.show();
00084 }
00085
